actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: To authorize the establishment of the Luther Burbank National Historic Site in the State of California and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the establishment of the Luther Burbank National Historic Site in Santa Rosa, California. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: To authorize the establishment of the Luther Burbank National Historic Site in the State of California and for other purposes.
